results.title: Metformin improves polycystic ovary syndrome in mice by inhibiting ovarian ferroptosis
results.text_hl: Morphological results showed that after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007690 @@@polycystic lesions@@@ in @DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovaries@@@ were reduced, the ovarian function was restored, and the expressions of @GENE_SIRT3 @GENE_64384 @@@SIRT3@@@ and @GENE_GPX4 @GENE_625249 @@@GPX4@@@ were elevated.
